name: Shadowland
description:
Shadowland is a game made by a one man studio in which you play as a shadow trying to escape a gray and empty world.

Where are you? How did you get there? How can you escape? Who is talking to you? Shadowland won't give you the answer to any of this questions, but you might find some of your own.


Shadowland combines 2D platforming with puzzle elements alternating and combining both types of challenges.


Key Features:

  • Innovative and original playstyle
  • +80 Levels divided in 8 thematic chapters
  • Original soundtrack
  • 4 light/shadow combinations with unique effects
  • Available in English, Spanish and Catalan
